description: At Italian Restaurant, we offer classic Italian dishes made with fresh ingredients.

menu.description: At Italian Restaurant, these are the main dishes.

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Traditional baked pasta with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese
items.image_prompt: A classic photo of Lasagna, baked to perfection, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Tagliata Di Manzo
items.description: Sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A mouthwatering photo of Tagliata Di Manzo, sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Risotto Ai Funghi
items.description: Creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A creamy photo of Risotto Ai Funghi, with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan, served at Italian Restaurant.
